articles.title: Eddie McGuire to rest from footy media roles for unknown period - The Age

articles.title: Australian Open 2021: Bernard Tomic slams John Fitzgerald after straight-sets loss to Denis Shapovalov. - The Age
articles.description: Bernard Tomic did not hold back after Fitzgerald said he did not expect to see the controversial star return to next year’s Australian Open.
articles.content:
In commentary, Fitzgerald queried whether Tomic would return to Melbourne Park next year.
